subject: Keen to Collaborate in Music Business Research
body:
Hello {{RECIPIENT_NAME}},

My name is Chinmay Shringi. I understand your time is valuable, so I’ll keep it brief. I am:

	- A full-stack developer with over 5 years of hands-on industry experience in application development and cloud technologies.
	- Currently pursuing a Master’s in Computer Engineering at New York University (NYU).
	- I am looking for an on-campus job.

I am reaching out to explore potential opportunities to collaborate on {{COLABORATE_ON}}


Thank you for considering my request. I would appreciate any guidance on available opportunities or next steps.

Best regards,
Chinmay Shringi
+1(201) 284-0211
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chinmay-shringi-105736173/
GitHub: https://github.com/ChinmayShringi
My Website: https://chinmayshringi.web.app/
name: Helga
COLABORATE_ON: research initiatives related to music business, as these areas align closely with my skills and interests.
